QuestData.Title: Fight Like a Wildhammer
QuestData.Description: <Blundy upends his cup.>$B$BI'm all outta ale, $n!$B$BHead out into the Thundermar Ruins and see if there's any left, before those grungy Dragonmaw get their mouths on it.$B$BFeel free to have a few sips, yerself. A mug of ol' Thundermar's finest will fortify yer fightin' skills.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Kegs of Thundermar Ale from the Thundermar Ruins. Carfeul - it's got some kick!
